feed.title: Docker Socket Proxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docker Socket Proxy: v0.1.0
entry.content: First official release :tada: Although this is not the beginning of the project, it will be the first tagged version.

entry.title: New release for Docker Socket Proxy: v0.1.1
entry.content: • Dummy release to trigger correct image tags

entry.title: New release for Docker Socket Proxy: v0.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unused metadata by @yajo in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/42
  • Updates HAProxy to the 2.2-alpine tag by @stumpylog in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/30
  • Fix docs: specify port on DOCKER_HOST variable by @joao-p-marques in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/52
  • Update README info after #40 by @joao-p-marques in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/53
  • Fix typo in link by @kaykayehnn in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/55
  • Add support for /grpc api by @rubengees in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/61
  • Add environment variable to configure Docker socket location in image by @bachya in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/64
  • [UPD] pre-commit by @Tardo in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/72
  • Rebuild container weekly by @RealOrangeOne in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/71
  • Bump py from 1.9.0 to 1.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/73
  • flake8 has moved to github by @mikemhenry in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/77
  • [DCK] pre-commit dependences updated by @josep-tecnativa in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/99
  • fix: no timeout for events route by @xstefanox in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/98
  • Fix: minor typo in readme by @sammcj in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/100
  • feat: add options for allowing stop and start by @sammcj in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/106
  • Bind to IPv4 and IPv6 in haproxy by @saltydk in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/108
  • [FIX] Fix CI by running poetry update by @josep-tecnativa in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/116
  • add config templating by @saltydk in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/111

New Contributors

  • @stumpylog made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/30
  • @kaykayehnn made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/55
  • @rubengees made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/61
  • @bachya made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/64
  • @Tardo made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/72
  • @RealOrangeOne made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/71
  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/73
  • @mikemhenry made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/77
  • @josep-tecnativa made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/99
  • @xstefanox made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/98
  • @sammcj made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/100
  • @saltydk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/108

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

entry.title: New release for Docker Socket Proxy: v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: updated to HAproxy 3.0 and forced running as root by @proudier in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/130

New Contributors

  • @proudier made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/130

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/compare/v0.1.2...v0.2.0

entry.title: New release for Docker Socket Proxy: v0.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • test: pause after container creation + poetry deps update by @proudier in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/138
  • Revert "chore: updated to HAproxy 3.0 and forced running as root" by @proudier in https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/pull/136

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0
